meanings.definition: The practices, beliefs, and rituals associated with a particular group or organization.
meanings.sent1: The cultism of the ancient tribe involved daily ceremonies and sacred dances.
meanings.sent2: The cultism of the yoga community promotes mindfulness and inner peace.
meanings.sent3: The cultism around the new superhero movie led to fans dressing up as characters.
meanings.sent4: The cultism of celebrity worship can sometimes blind people to reality.
meanings.sent5: The cultism of the secret society was shrouded in mystery and intrigue.

meanings.definition: Excessive devotion or admiration for a particular person, idea, or thing.
meanings.sent1: Her cultism towards her favorite singer was evident in her room filled with posters.
meanings.sent2: The cultism of his love for chocolate knew no bounds.
meanings.sent3: His cultism for video games often led to late-night gaming sessions.
meanings.sent4: The cultism for the new tech gadget spread like wildfire among tech enthusiasts.
meanings.sent5: The cultism for the author's books was so strong that fans lined up for hours to meet him.
